subject: Hockey, Ice
All Star Games
lead_paragraph: A successful Internet campaign landed Scott, a Coyotes brawler, a captaincy in the N.H.L. All-Star Game. The problem? He was then traded to the Canadiens and sent to the minor leagues.
snippet: A successful Internet campaign landed Scott, a Coyotes brawler, a captaincy in the N.H.L. All-Star Game. The problem? He was then traded to the Canadiens and sent to the minor leagues.
